backlog.name: Enhanced enact init with Templates
backlog.description: Support multiple init modes for different use cases: tool development, agent projects, and AI-specific configs.
completed_features: enact init --tool (default) - creates enact.md + AGENTS.md for tool development
enact init --agent - creates AGENTS.md for projects that use Enact tools
enact init --claude - creates CLAUDE.md with Claude-specific instructions
Templates loaded from separate .md files for maintainability

backlog.name: Streamable HTTP MCP Server
backlog.description: Implement MCP server using the new Streamable HTTP transport for stateless, scalable deployment.
tasks: Implement Streamable HTTP transport (replaces deprecated HTTP+SSE)
Support optional SSE streaming for long-running tools
Deploy as serverless function (Cloudflare Workers / Vercel)
backlog.notes: Streamable HTTP is the new recommended transport for remote MCP servers. Supports both simple request/response and streaming via SSE when needed.
